overview:
Ms. Christensen has served as Chief Financial Officer of Northgate since 2002. Prior to Northgate, Ms. Christensen worked at Horsley Bridge Partners for 13 years in several senior financial management roles, including Chief Financial Officer, Chief Accounting Officer, and Controller. During her tenure Ms. Christensen oversaw and participated in the creation of Horsley Bridge Partners’ financial infrastructure, systems, and policies. Prior to Horsley Bridge, Ms. Christensen was Controller of Retail Property Development, a real estate developer, and was a senior auditor at KMG Main Hurdman, the predecessor to KPMG Peat Marwick.

Ms. Christensen earned her CPA in 1986 and holds a B.S. in Accounting from Brigham Young University.
